forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High around 5C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun. High 42F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Snow likely late. Low -2C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow developing after midnight. Low 31F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will mix with rain at times during the afternoon. High 2C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. High 38F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers becoming a steady accumulating snow later on. High 2C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early, with a steadier snow developing late in the day. High 37F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low -1C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Light snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low 32F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low around 35F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High 4C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning transitioning to light rain in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 1C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 36F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 4C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 1C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low around 35F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 4C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 42F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low near 0C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Snow showers overnight. Low 34F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 4C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High around 40F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and wet snow in the evening will transition to some light freezing rain overnight. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 2-3cm of snow and ice expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Moderating temperatures will change evening snow showers to rain showers by daybreak. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
